title: Is Hotel California song about an insane asylum? - Quora

response.answer_text: It’s about a hotel in Baja California located at Todas Santos. However in fairness I have read that the Hotel has no relationship to the song beyond its name. The song is about several places including a mental hospital, a Satanic Church, what have you- If someone knows for sure please speak up

Supposedly about Camarillo State Mental Hospital - Wikipedia which is now used as a college: California State University Channel Islands, midway between Los Angeles and Santa Barbara. The older part of the campus is beautiful, it’s only been a university since 2002, but interestingly, it was designed in the 1930s by the same architects as San Diego State University, so it has that same look to it.
